runs.comm: swinging in, goes off the pads behind square on leg for a leg bye
swinging away from length well outside off, big swing and miss
much wider outside off with outswing, it's left alone for a wide

clever work from van der Gugten or was it luck? The ball deflected off his hand to the stumps at non-striker's end and Munsey is run out! It was drilled back by Coetzer to the bowler, he put his right hand down and the ball deflected to the stumps
big swing outside off, thick outside edge flies to third man after a bounce
almost a yorker into the pads, deflects away behind square on leg
pretty full outside off and it's drilled down to mid-off where a misfield gets them four
starts with a wide down the leg side
coming in towards leg stump, clipped away off the pads for one
tries to punch the ball outside off and misses the back of length ball
holes out to long-on. He made room for the short of length ball, pulled a bit awkwardly and only found long on
lbw appeal as the ball hits the pads in front of the stumps but after an inside edge
makes room and lets the ball go down leg for a wide
short of length on middle, bottom edge goes to short third man for one
short and wide, Cross cuts that square with some timing and it goes flying over point for a cracking four
defends the short of length ball on off
makes room and drives the fullish ball angling in towards mid off
solid defence down the ground off the length delivery
angling in, it's clipped straight to midwicket
good effort at point and nearly a run out at bowler's end after the batsman steered the ball to point
goes over point this time, after a bounce though, after he made room and chopped the ball firmly on off
accurate delivery on off stump, he defends on off for a quick single
creamed through the off side! He made room, got a length delivery and slammed it past cover point for four
fuller and towards leg stump now, driven to cover
tucks the ball with the angle to midwicket for one
opens up his body and then opens the face of the bat to drive that ball through the gap between cover point and point for four
slams the full ball straight to midwicket who has a shy at the non-striker's stumps
makes room and slams the ball from back of length on the off side, through the covers for four
slower ball and an offcutter, he swings and misses this time
short of length and takes the pace off again, pushed to cover
angling in towards leg, he opens up and swivels that behind square on leg for four
that's beautiful! Full ball outside off and he crashed that with a cover drive, big swing, and got four
makes room again, ball comes in and hits the pad after an inside edge
flighted and full on middle, steered straight to point

the move works, wicket on first ball! Cross slog-swept the full delivery on the leg side, got a top edge and Jamil took a good catch running backwards. The ball popped out on first attempt but he held it the second time
on the leg side now, it's paddle swept to short fine leg
slow and full on middle, driven with the turn to cover
waits for it to come in and cuts it late towards short third man
fuller on leg stump, steered to cover point for one
flighted full toss around off, smacked to deep midwicket
flatter delivery well outside off, steered to cover point
flat and short well outside off, he goes across and turns it to deep square leg
goes on the back foot and steers it to deep cover
whips the ball from outside off to midwicket for one more

stunning catch at deep midwicket, another one goes down! Slog-sweep against the turn, goes high on the leg side and Bukhari runs, Bukhari dives and Bukhari catches the ball with both hands to his left side while sliding
short ball outside off, chops it back to the bowler
touch fuller and it's steered to deep cover for one
googly from off stump to the off side, he could not pick that
swats the ball from well outside off to short fine leg
swept with the turn to leg in the gap between long on and deep midwicket for two
punches this one to deep cover for one
shortish towards off stump, he goes back and cuts it to the point boundary for a four
slightly slow on off side, pushed back to the bowler
touch wider and fuller, and it's driven nicely to deep cover
tries to sweep from well outside off and misses

the keeper appeals for caught behind, pretty much alone, and the finger goes up! MacLeod reverse-swept the ball well outside off and the ball went into the gloves, as he probably missed. Looks like the sound was of bat hitting the ground
flighted on off stump, driven down to long off
length delivery on off, pushed down to long off for one
nice flight on off stump, he blocks it back
swept with the turn and it's gone past short fine leg, but deep backward square leg gets to it
on leg stump now, swept straight to short fine leg and a quick throw nearly leads to a collision between bowler and batsman
flighted outside off, drilled down to long off
flighted on leg stump, worked down to long on for one
just outside off, he stays back and cuts to point
charges down to take it on the full and hammers it down to beat long on for four
charges down again but holes out to long-off! It was outside off, he took it on the full and gave a straightforward catch to Cooper
angled into the pads, worked to short fine leg
pretty short outside off, it's punched straight to extra cover
googly goes further away from off, it's swatted down to long on for one
this one turns away too as he goes back and slices to deep point
it was slightly short, he pulled off the back foot and could not clear short fine leg

another good catch in the deep, seven down! Van der Merwe waited at deep midwicket after Leask swept the ball in the air, and he he jumped at the right time to catch that over his head with both hands
short of length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
turning in from length around off, tucked to midwicket for one
drives the full ball down to long off for one
drills the full ball straight to cover
comes down and finds cover again
makes room this time for the ball on leg, drives to cover again but manages a quick single
that's gone through the batsman and then through the keeper's legs after it didn't bounce as much on the off side. Given as runs off the bat
towards the leg side now and it's deflected fine on leg for two
Mommsen shows hoe it's done, he turned on the back foot, waited for the ball to turn and slammed that wide of deep fine leg for four in the gap
tries the same thing again but is struck on the pad around off this time
sweeps the ball with the turn to deep fine leg
van der Merwe doesn't have a chance this time as Mommsen sweeps with the turn and has hit it well enough to get six
same strategy again, go back and whack the ball witht he turn to leg. Van der Merwe slides in the deep and throws the ball to his team-mate while on the ground to save two
drives the ball straight back to the bowler this time
towards the pads and Sharif slogs that to the square leg boundary for four!
full on off stump, pushed down to long off for one
full and outside leg, struck on the pad for a leg bye
touch short of length and it's pulled to deep square leg
full ball just outside leg, he swings and misses. Wasn't too far from leg stump
slower short ball, pulled to deep midwicket after the wait
nearly yorks himself after coming down and flicks the ball to deep midwicket, quickly comes back for the second
defends the ball back to the bowler
slog-sweep comes out again, reaches the fielder in the deep after a bounce
fuller on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket for one
makes room to smash the ball but there's no room
much slower now and towards the pads, he sweeps and misses
full delivery on leg stump, driven with an edge to deep fine leg
little slower and shorter on leg stump, lofted down to long on
smacked! Gets a back of length ball on the leg side and he bludgeons that over deep midwicket for a huge six
rockets the fuller delivery to the wide long on boundary for a flat four. No ball for overstepping
low full toss is struck back for a catch, goes off the hands to long off
in the block hole on middle, pushed down to long off
fifty for Mommsen as he targets the leg side again, launches the full ball to the wide long-on boundary for four
full on off, works it down to long off for one
turns the ball to the leg side against the spin for one
comes down and heaves the ball to deep midwicket for one
on the leg side and it's lofted down to long on for one
nicely done! He made room, got a full ball outside off and drove it inside out over the covers for four
back of length outside off, cuts it to cover point
outside off again, it's struck straight to point
put down at short fine leg, tough chance though! The batsman pulled the short ball, got a top edge and the ball was nearly caught behind square
tonked! Full toss on the stumps and he smashes that to the midwicket boundary with a big swing
superb effort from van der Merwe and he nearly takes it! Top edge went high on the leg side, he ran in to save his life and dived forward, got his hands to it too
makes room and drives it inside out in the gap, does it go all the way, just a bounce before the ropes
direct hit from Bukhari does it. Mommsen pushed the ball back and Bukhari went to his left, the batsmen ran and he picked the ball and hit the stumps at the keeper's end
hits the stumps again, this time he's bowled! Evans swings his bat wildly to the leg side, misses, and the ball strikes the off stump
dot ball as the batsman comes down and swings, the ball cuts away and just misses the off stump
another catch for van der Merwe, this one at long-off as he lofts the ball straight down the ground for an easy catch
